members.joinCircumstances: Smoker commands the G-5 Marines as Vice Admiral
Tashigi serves as Captain under Smoker's command

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines Infiltrate Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Smoker leads the G-5 Marines in blasting through ice barriers and entering Punk Hazard via a hidden river, unaware they're being monitored.
keyMoments.significance: The Marines enter the forbidden island to investigate illegal activities, bringing them into conflict with Law and Caesar Clown.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Encounters Law as Shichibukai
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines are shocked and terrified when they encounter Trafalgar Law, learning he is now one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Creates immediate tension as the Marines must deal with a powerful Warlord on a forbidden island.

members.joinCircumstances: Law founded and leads the Heart Pirates

keyMoments.title: Law's Post-Timeskip Appearance
keyMoments.description: Law appears for the first time since the timeskip, now as a Shichibukai stationed at Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Heart Pirates' captain's new status and sets up the eventual alliance with the Straw Hats.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a fur hat and crossbones, with a smiley face design

keyMoments.title: Brook Battles Torso Samurai
keyMoments.description: Brook encounters and fights the mysterious torso samurai on the frozen side of Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Brook's first major combat in the Punk Hazard arc.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Group Attacked by Brownbeard
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Zoro, Usopp, and Robin are attacked by Brownbeard and his centaur unit at the lake.
keyMoments.significance: First direct combat between the Straw Hats and the island's defenders.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Protects the Children
keyMoments.description: Chopper fights hazmat soldiers to protect kidnapped children in the laboratory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Straw Hats' commitment to protecting innocents.

keyMoments.title: Discovery of Sheep Soldiers
keyMoments.description: Sanji and Franky discover the hazmat soldiers are sheep-like creatures.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of Caesar's hybrid experiments.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
